arabic_text: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ
translation: The people of Noah rejected [the truth] before them[4], as well as the companions of the Well[5] and Thamūd,
footnotes:
[4] i.e., before the pagans of Makkah.
 [5] i.e., people of prophet Shu‘ayb or other people. See footnote 25:38.
